description: http: make ResponseWriter.WriteHeader return an error

messages.text:
Why?  This just encourages people to check the error,
and what are they going to do differently in response?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5296046: http: make ResponseWriter.WriteHeader return an error
